name: Corporate Ladder
description:
My competition entry for Ludum Dare 40.

Corporate Ladder - Go to work, do the same repetitive tasks every day and slowly inch your way up the corporate ladder!

But watch out - the more important you are, the more difficult things get!

CONTROLS
Move: WASD
Interact: E
Look at business card: B
Quit to menu: ESCAPE

You can also play a more polished, less buggy version I uploaded after LD40.
